name: Green Rootz
description: Green Rootz is a leading service provider of recruitment solutions for the Internet, Ecommerce, Media, and Mobile Apps industry1. It also offers a superior range of natural fruit and vegetable powders, dairy powders, natural food colours, and dehydrated vegetables. The company focuses on growth and relevancy.
features: Supply workforce in print media sector
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Recruitment Company with focus exclusively on Media & Entertainment, Digital, Ecommerce & Mobile space
ShortDescription: Green Rootz, set up in 2007 provide recruitment to Media & Entertainment, Internet, Mobile Apps & Ecommerce Industry in India.
enhanced_description: Green Rootz is a recruitment solutions service provider, established in 2007, specializing in supplying a high-skilled workforce. They offer a one-stop solution for recruitment needs, primarily serving the Internet, Ecommerce, Media, and Mobile Apps industries, including the print media sector in India. Their service aims to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Providing recruitment solutions for Internet, Ecommerce, Media, and Mobile Apps industries
Acting as a one-stop solution for hiring needs
competitive_advantages: Specialized focus on specific industry verticals (Internet, Ecommerce, Media, Mobile Apps)
Positioned as a 'one-stop solution' for recruitment
primary_users: Companies in Internet, Ecommerce, Media, and Mobile Apps industries
